H0.text: Getting a vaccination is the best way to help prevent the flu from becoming a pandemic.

H1.text: Taking antibiotics is the best way to help prevent the flu from becoming a pandemic.

H2.text: Eating fruits and vegetables is the best way to help prevent the flu from becoming a pandemic.

H3.text: Washing hands often is the best way to help prevent the flu from becoming a pandemic.

A4.text: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends the flu vaccine as the best way to protect people against the flu and prevent its spread.

A5.text: The influenza vaccine is indicated for active immunization for the prevention of influenza disease caused by influenza virus subtypes A and type B contained in the vaccine.
